name: Awesome-alfred-workflows
tagline: A collection of awesome Alfred 3 workflows.
body: # Awesome Alfred Workflows [![Awesome](https://cdn.rawgit.com/sindresorhus/awesome/d7305f38d29fed78fa85652e3a63e154dd8e8829/media/badge.svg)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome) A curated collection of awesome Alfred 3 workflows. This is being written by the guidelines from [awesome](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome). However, there might be some misguided contents even with our best effort since we are new in this **Awesome** movement and still learning. ## Table of Contents - [Web](#web) - [Finder](#finder) - [Development](#development) - [한국어 사용자](#한국어-사용자) - [Best other sources](#best-other-sources) ## Web - [Chrome Bookmarks](http://www.packal.org/workflow/chrome-bookmarks-0) makes you access to your Chrome bookmarks on your fingertips: > `,b` > ## Finder - [Autojump](http://www.packal.org/workflow/autojump) is Finder version of [autojump](https://github.com/wting/autojump). With this you can navigate your filesystem and open the folder you want into Finder: > `j` > ## Development - [Secure SHell](http://www.packal.org/workflow/secure-shell) opens SSH/SFTP connections with autosuggestion of known hosts: > `ssh` > - [Show Vim Cheatsheet](http://www.packal.org/workflow/show-vim-cheatsheet) shows a cheatsheet for vim using quicklook. Simple and useful: > `vi` > * [Tunnelblick Toggle](http://www.packal.org/workflow/tunnelblick-toggle) checks and toggles the status of Tunnelblick connections: > `vpn` > ## 한국어 사용자 - [KoZip](http://www.packal.org/workflow/kozip)는 "도로명/지번 한영 주소 검색"을 하고 해당 주소를 지도에서 찾아볼 때 유용하다. > `kz` > ## Best other sources - [Official Forum](http://www.alfredforum.com/) has the vast amount of workflows. - [Official Website](https://www.alfredapp.com/workflows/) curated the best one from its official forum. - [Packal](http://packal.org/) is a user-created repository, which provides workflows with quality.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
